### ACS Data
```{r low-inc-acs}

# Setup the ACS geographies: Seattle (tracts), YCC (tracts), Seattle (place)
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

ycc_geo_acs <- c(
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_sea_sp$TRACTCE)),
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_ycc_sp@data[tr_ycc_sp$NHOOD_ABBR=='CH','GEOID6']),combine = TRUE, combine.term = 'CH'),
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_ycc_sp@data[tr_ycc_sp$NHOOD_ABBR=='CA','GEOID6']),combine = TRUE, combine.term = 'CA'),
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_ycc_sp@data[tr_ycc_sp$NHOOD_ABBR=='FH','GEOID6']),combine = TRUE, combine.term = 'FH'),
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_ycc_sp@data[tr_ycc_sp$NHOOD_ABBR=='CID','GEOID6']),combine = TRUE, combine.term = 'CID'),
        acs::geo.make(state = "WA",county = "King", tract = as.numeric(tr_ycc_sp@data[tr_ycc_sp$NHOOD_ABBR %in% c('CH','CA','FH','CID'),'GEOID6']),combine = TRUE, combine.term = 'YCC'),
        acs::geo.make(state = 'WA', place = "Seattle")
)

# Download the ACS data and save the object as a .rds file
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

if(!file.exists(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-orig-acs.rds'))){
        
        tbl <- "C17002"  # census table code
        
        acs.fetch(endyear = 2014, geography = ycc_geo_acs, 
                  table.number = tbl) %>%
                write_rds(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-orig-acs.rds'))
        
}

low_inc_orig_acs <- read_rds(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-orig-acs.rds'))


# Process and save the data
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

if(!file.exists(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-acs.rds'))){
        low_inc_acs1 <- low_inc_orig_acs

low_inc_acs2 <- low_inc_acs1[, "C17002_001"] - low_inc_acs1[, "C17002_008"] 
                        
acs.colnames(low_inc_acs2) <- "LOW_INCOME"
                        
low_inc_acs2 %<>%
        cbind(low_inc_acs1, .)
                        
# Find the proportion of People of Color to the Total population
low_inc_acs3 <-  
        apply(
                X = low_inc_acs2[, "LOW_INCOME"],
                MARGIN = 1,
                FUN = divide.acs,
                denominator = low_inc_acs2[, 1],
                method = "proportion",
                verbose = FALSE
        ) 
                        
acs.colnames(low_inc_acs3) <- "LOW_INC_PCT"

low_inc_acs <- low_inc_acs3

# Save the object

low_inc_acs %>% saveRDS(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-acs.rds'))
}

low_inc_acs <- read_rds(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-acs.rds'))


# Plot the data
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

plot(low_inc_acs)




```

### Dataframe

```{r low-inc-all-df}

# Convert the `acs` object into a dataframe and save the object
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Tracts only
if(!file.exists(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-all-df.rds'))){
        
        data.frame(
        geography(low_inc_acs)["tract"],
        estimate(low_inc_acs), 
        1.645 * standard.error(low_inc_acs)) %>% 
        `colnames<-`(., c("NAME", "LOW_INC_PCT_EST","LOW_INC_PCT_MOE")) %>% 
        mutate(VAR = 'LOW_INCOME',
               NAME = if_else(is.na(NAME),'SEA',NAME),
               UPPER = LOW_INC_PCT_EST + LOW_INC_PCT_MOE, 
               LOWER = LOW_INC_PCT_EST - LOW_INC_PCT_MOE, 
               UPPER = if_else(UPPER > 1, 1, UPPER), 
               LOWER = if_else(LOWER < 0, 0, LOWER)) %>%
                select(VAR,everything()) %>% 
        write_rds(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-all-df.rds'))
}

low_inc_all_df <- read_rds(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-all-df.rds'))

# View the df object
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

view_low_inc_dotplot <- function() {
        gg <- ggplot(low_inc_all_df, aes(x = reorder(NAME, 
                                             low_inc_PCT_EST), y = low_inc_PCT_EST))
        gg <- gg + geom_linerange(aes(ymin = LOWER, 
                                      ymax = UPPER), size = 1.5, alpha = 0.25)
        gg <- gg + geom_point_interactive(aes(tooltip = NAME), 
                                          size = 3, shape = 21, color = "white", fill = "grey30")
        gg <- gg + scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0.01, 
                                               0))
        gg <- gg + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent)
        gg <- gg + coord_flip()
        gg <- gg + theme_minimal()
        gg <- gg + theme(panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(), 
                         panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(), 
                         panel.grid.major.x = element_line(linetype = 3, 
                                                           color = "grey30"), 
                         panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(), 
                         axis.text.y = element_blank())
        gg <- gg + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, title = "LOW INCOME", 
                        subtitle = "Description", 
                        caption = "Source: ACS Table B03002, Five-Year Estimates (2010-2014)")
        gg
}

# view_low_inc_dotplot()

view_low_inc_dotplot_int <- function() {
        ggiraph(code = {
                print(view_low_inc_dotplot())
        }, width = 0.66, tooltip_extra_css = "padding:2px;background:rgba(70,70,70,0.1);color:black;border-radius:2px 2px 2px 2px;", 
        hover_css = "fill:#1279BF;stroke:#1279BF;cursor:pointer;")
}

view_low_inc_dotplot_int()


```

#### Map
```{r low-inc-sea-tr-sp}

# Join the df to the sp object and save
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

if(!file.exists(root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-sea-tr-sp.gpkg'))){
        
low_inc_sea_tr_sp <- tr_sea_sp[,'GEOID6']

low_inc_sea_tr_sp@data %<>% left_join(low_inc_sea_tr_df, by = c("GEOID6" = "NAME"))

low_inc_sea_tr_sp %>% writeOGR(dsn = root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-sea-tr-sp.gpkg'),
                    layer = "low_inc_sp", driver = "GPKG", verbose = FALSE, 
         overwrite_layer = TRUE)
}

low_inc_sea_tr_sp <-  readOGR(dsn = root_file('1-data/4-interim/low-inc-sea-tr-sp.gpkg'),
                    layer = "low_inc_sp", 
                    verbose = FALSE, 
                    stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
        spTransform(crs_proj)


# View the sp object
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

view_low_inc_sea_tr_sp <- function() {
        abbr <- low_inc_sea_tr_sp
        
        myYlOrRd <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(9, "YlOrRd")[2:7]
        max <- max(abbr@data$LOW_INC_PCT_EST) %>% round_any(0.1, 
                                                        ceiling)
        pal <- colorNumeric(palette = myYlOrRd, domain = c(0, 
                                                           max))
        
        myLfltGrey(hideControls = FALSE) %>% 
                addPolygons(data = abbr, smoothFactor = 0, 
                            color = col2hex("white"), weight = 1.5, opacity = 0.5, 
                            fillColor = ~pal(LOW_INC_PCT_EST), fillOpacity = 0.75, 
                            popup = ~GEOID6) %>% 
                addLegend(position = "topright", 
                          title = "LOW INCOME", 
                          pal = pal, 
                          values = c(0, max), 
                          opacity = 0.75, 
                          labFormat = labelFormat(suffix = "%", 
                                                  between = ", ",
                                                  transform = function(x) 100 * x)) %>% 
                addFullscreenControl()
        
}

view_low_inc_sea_tr_sp()

```
